name: Transorbital
description:
This is not really playable at the moment, but it runs and you can click around on things.

It's a stupidly over-ambitious project to make an MS-DOS suborbital / orbital ship sim.

To start the reactor:

  1. switch on master power 'Mstr'
  2. Right-click 0-9 dial a few times to set the level
  3. Right-click 0-1-S dial once to get a yellow indicator (primed)
  4. Right-click 0-1-S dial a second time to run starter system
  5. Once indicator is solid green, left-click 0-1-S dial to disengage starter system

Tested on FreeDOS and under DOSBox-X (my real MS-DOS box is unavailable atm).

It is buggy as all hell at the minute, but it is built with Allegro so if it freezes, Ctrl-Alt-Del should return you to the DOS prompt.
